channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Dropbox Built an AI Product Dash with RAG and AI Agents】Dropbox如何与RAG和AI代理商建造AI产品破折号
item.description: 【In this article, we look at how Dropbox leveraged RAG and AI Agents to make Dash a reality.】在本文中，我们研究了Dropbox如何利用抹布和AI代理使DASH成为现实。

item.title: 【EP178: The Lifecycle of a Kubernetes Pod】EP178：Kubernetes Pod的生命周期
item.description: 【What else will you add to understand the Kubernetes Pod Lifecycle?】您还可以添加什么来了解Kubernetes Pod生命周期？

item.title: 【A Detailed Guide to Content Delivery Networks】内容交付网络的详细指南
item.description: 【On the modern web, speed is a critical factor.】在现代网络上，速度是关键因素。

item.title: 【EP177: The Modern Software Stack】EP177：现代软件堆栈
item.description: 【In today’s world, building software means working across multiple layers, each with its own role, tools, and technologies.】在当今的世界中，构建软件意味着跨多层工作，每个层都具有自己的角色，工具和技术。

item.title: 【Top Strategies to Improve Reliability in Distributed Systems】提高分布式系统可靠性的最佳策略
item.description: 【In this article, we will take a closer look at strategies that can help improve the reliability of a system.】在本文中，我们将仔细研究可以帮助提高系统可靠性的策略。

item.title: 【How Reddit Delivers Notifications to Tens of Millions of Users】Reddit如何向数千万用户提供通知
item.description: 【Push notifications carry a double-edged sword in the design of any product. Done well, these notifications reconnect users with content they care about.】推送通知在任何产品的设计中都带有双刃剑。做得很好，这些通知将用户与他们关心的内容重新连接。

item.title: 【How LLMs See Images, Audio, and More】LLM如何查看图像，音频等
item.description: 【Just like how "Hello world!" becomes discrete tokens for text processing, a photograph gets chopped into image patches, and a song becomes a sequence of audio codes.】就像“你好世界”一样！成为用于文本处理的离散令牌，将照片切成图像贴片，歌曲成为一系列音频代码。

item.title: 【EP176: How Does SSO Work?】EP176：SSO如何工作？
item.description: 【Single Sign-On (SSO) is an authentication scheme. It allows a user to log in to different systems using a single ID.】单登录（SSO）是一种身份验证方案。它允许用户使用单个ID登录到不同的系统。

item.title: 【A Guide to Top Caching Strategies】顶级缓存策略指南
item.description: 【In this article, we will explore the critical caching strategies that enable fast, reliable systems.】在本文中，我们将探讨能够快速，可靠系统的关键缓存策略。

item.title: 【How Atlassian Migrated 4 Million Jira Databases to AWS Aurora】Atlassian如何将400万JIRA数据库迁移到AWS Aurora
item.description: 【Atlassian routinely migrates about 1,000 databases every day as part of its regular operations, and its users never notice.】作为常规操作的一部分，Atlassian通常每天迁移约1,000个数据库，其用户从未注意到。
